MS: Which of the following are true about two-flip-flop synchronizers     as opposed to one-flip-flop synchronizers? Select all that apply.
column3: NOT HTML
2-FF synchronizers make glitches more unlikely, but even better protection can be achieved with more FFs
2-FF synchronizers offer more protection while speeding up the circuit's operation
2-FF synchronizers offer more protection without any additional delay
2-FF synchronizers are more glitch-resistant at the cost of more delay
